Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2014 12:04AM leftyloo wrote: Shayne36 yes! i got 2 big ones 2 consecutive days (one was embarassingly in public), and blamed it on the claritin (for the neupogen shot resulting bone pain) and the dry winter weather where i live... i stopped the claritin (with my nurses permission - switched to regularly taken extra strength tylenol), turned on my humidifier, cut off a bit of my aloe vera plant, coated the gel with 2 slightly damp cotton balls and stuck those up each nostril :), then the next day i broke down and bought some vaseline and have used that ever since (3 days now) with only a minor bit of blood once. good luck!
